Discipline.name: Architecture Discipline
Discipline.description: The Architecture Discipline focuses on the study of architectural design, construction techniques, and sustainable building practices.

Discipline.name: Computer Science & Engineering Discipline
Discipline.description: The Computer Science & Engineering Discipline covers areas like computer programming, software development, algorithms, and computer networking.

Discipline.name: Urban and Rural Planning Discipline
Discipline.description: The Urban and Rural Planning Discipline focuses on urban and regional planning, sustainable development, and spatial analysis.

Discipline.name: Electronics and Communication Engineering Discipline
Discipline.description: The Electronics and Communication Engineering Discipline covers areas like electronic circuits, communication systems, and digital signal processing.

Discipline.name: Mathematics Discipline
Discipline.description: The Mathematics Discipline focuses on mathematical theories, applied mathematics, and mathematical modeling.

Discipline.name: Physics Discipline
Discipline.description: The Physics Discipline covers areas like classical and quantum mechanics, electromagnetism, and optics.

Discipline.name: Chemistry Discipline
Discipline.description: The Chemistry Discipline focuses on the study of chemical elements, compounds, and their properties.

Discipline.name: Statistics Discipline
Discipline.description: The Statistics Discipline covers areas like probability theory, statistical inference, and data analysis.

Discipline.name: Business Administration Discipline
Discipline.description: The Business Administration Discipline focuses on various aspects of management, including finance, marketing, and human resource management.

Discipline.name: Human Resource Management Discipline
Discipline.description: The Human Resource Management Discipline covers areas like employee recruitment, training and development, and labor relations.

Discipline.name: Forestry & Wood Technology Discipline
Discipline.description: The Forestry & Wood Technology Discipline focuses on sustainable forest management, wood processing, and forest ecosystem conservation.

Discipline.name: Fisheries & Marine Resource Technology Discipline
Discipline.description: The Fisheries & Marine Resource Technology Discipline covers areas like aquaculture, fishery management, and marine ecosystem studies.

Discipline.name: Biotechnology & Genetic Engineering Discipline
Discipline.description: The Biotechnology & Genetic Engineering Discipline focuses on genetic engineering techniques, bioprocess engineering, and molecular biology.

Discipline.name: Agrotechnology Discipline
Discipline.description: The Agrotechnology Discipline covers areas like crop production, agricultural engineering, and farm management.

Discipline.name: Environmental Science Discipline
Discipline.description: The Environmental Science Discipline focuses on environmental pollution, conservation, and sustainable development.

Discipline.name: Pharmacy Discipline
Discipline.description: The Pharmacy Discipline covers areas like pharmaceutical chemistry, pharmacology, and pharmaceutical technology.

Discipline.name: Soil, Water and Environment Discipline
Discipline.description: The Soil, Water and Environment Discipline focuses on soil and water resource management, environmental impact assessment, and natural resource conservation.

Discipline.name: Economics Discipline
Discipline.description: The Economics Discipline covers areas like microeconomics, macroeconomics, and econometrics.

Discipline.name: Sociology Discipline
Discipline.description: The Sociology Discipline focuses on the study of society, social institutions, and social change.

Discipline.name: Development Studies Discipline
Discipline.description: The Development Studies Discipline covers areas like development theories, poverty alleviation, and sustainable development practices.

Discipline.name: Mass Communication & Journalism Discipline
Discipline.description: The Mass Communication & Journalism Discipline focuses on media studies, journalism ethics, and mass communication theories.

Discipline.name: English Discipline
Discipline.description: The English Discipline covers areas like English literature, linguistics, and language teaching methodologies.

Discipline.name: Bangla Discipline
Discipline.description: The Bangla Discipline focuses on Bengali literature, language studies, and cultural heritage.

Discipline.name: History and Civilization Discipline
Discipline.description: The History and Civilization Discipline covers areas like world history, cultural studies, and historical research methodologies.

Discipline.name: Drawing and Painting Discipline
Discipline.description: The Drawing and Painting Discipline focuses on fine arts, drawing techniques, and painting styles.

Discipline.name: Printmaking Discipline
Discipline.description: The Printmaking Discipline covers areas like traditional printmaking techniques, digital printmaking, and printmaking history.

Discipline.name: Sculpture Discipline
Discipline.description: The Sculpture Discipline focuses on sculpting techniques, materials, and contemporary sculpture practices.

Discipline.name: Law Discipline
Discipline.description: The Law Discipline covers areas like constitutional law, criminal law, and legal research methodologies.

Discipline.name: Education Discipline
Discipline.description: The Education Discipline offers courses in educational theory, curriculum development, and educational psychology.

Accommodation.name: Aparajita Hall
Accommodation.description: Aparajita Hall provides accommodation facilities for female students.

Accommodation.name: Bangamata Begum Fazilatunnessa Mujib Hall
Accommodation.description: Bangamata Begum Fazilatunnessa Mujib Hall offers accommodation for female students.

Accommodation.name: Khan Jahan Ali Hall
Accommodation.description: Khan Jahan Ali Hall provides accommodation facilities for male students.

Accommodation.name: Khan Bahadur Ahsanullah Hall
Accommodation.description: Khan Bahadur Ahsanullah Hall offers accommodation for male students.

Accommodation.name: Jatir Janak Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Hall
Accommodation.description: Jatir Janak Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Hall provides accommodation facilities for male students.

Food & Cafe.name: Cafeteria
Food & Cafe.description: The cafeteria offers a variety of food options, including local and international cuisines.

Food & Cafe.name: Tapan Da
Food & Cafe.description: Tapan Da is a popular food stall known for its delicious street food.

Food & Cafe.name: NesCafe
Food & Cafe.description: NesCafe is a cozy cafe offering a range of coffee and baked goods.

Food & Cafe.name: Chow Corner
Food & Cafe.description: Chow Corner serves mouth-watering Chinese cuisine and quick bites.

Food & Cafe.name: Snack Bar
Food & Cafe.description: The Snack Bar offers a variety of snacks, sandwiches, and beverages.

Sports.name: Gymnasium
Sports.description: The gymnasium provides state-of-the-art fitness equipment and facilities for students and staff.

Sports.name: Sports Field
Sports.description: The sports field is a spacious outdoor area for various sports activities such as football, cricket, and athletics.

Sports.name: Table Tennis Arena
Sports.description: The Table Tennis Arena is equipped with professional tables for table tennis enthusiasts.

Sports.name: Swimming Pool
Sports.description: The Swimming Pool is available for recreational swimming and training sessions.

Sports.name: Basketball Court
Sports.description: The Basketball Court is an outdoor court for basketball enthusiasts.

Transportation.name: Bus
Transportation.description: The university provides bus services for convenient transportation of students and staff.

Transportation.name: Hice
Transportation.description: Hice (Highway Intercity Coach Service) is a comfortable mode of transportation for intercity travel.

Transportation.name: Private Car
Transportation.description: Private car services are available for faculty members and staff.

Transportation.name: Mini AC Bus
Transportation.description: Mini AC buses are provided for transportation within the campus.

Transportation.name: Bicycle
Transportation.description: Bicycles are available for students to move around the campus conveniently.

Facilities.name: Central Mosque
Facilities.description: The central mosque is a place of worship for the university community and hosts religious activities.

Facilities.name: Central Library
Facilities.description: The central library provides a vast collection of books, research materials, and study spaces for students.

Facilities.name: Mukto Monch
Facilities.description: Mukto Monch is an open-air amphitheater used for various cultural and academic events.

Facilities.name: Medical Center
Facilities.description: The Medical Center offers healthcare services and medical assistance to students and staff.

Facilities.name: Research Center
Facilities.description: The Research Center provides a dedicated space for research activities and collaborative work.

Facilities.name: Odommo Bangla
Facilities.description: Odommo Bangla is a cultural center promoting Bengali language and heritage.
